organic_opening.name: Organic Opening
organic_opening.description: An ensemble-driven opening where performers move, speak, and react freely to a suggestion. Patterns, images, emotions, and relationships emerge organically, providing rich thematic fuel for scenes.

monologue.name: Monologue
monologue.description: A single performer shares a true, personal story inspired by the suggestion. The specificity, emotion, and point of view provide grounded material for scenes that explore similar themes or perspectives.

invocation.name: Invocation
invocation.description: Performers call out short words, phrases, or ideas inspired by the suggestion. The ensemble builds shared energy and a web of associations that can be mined for scenes.

living_room.name: Living Room
living_room.description: Performers sit casually and have a conversational, grounded discussion about the suggestion. Personal anecdotes, opinions, and tangents naturally generate scene ideas.

pattern_game.name: Pattern Game
pattern_game.description: The ensemble discovers a repeating verbal or physical pattern inspired by the suggestion. The game establishes tone and structure that can be revisited and heightened later in the show.

deconstruction.name: Deconstruction
deconstruction.description: The group explores the suggestion by breaking it down word by word, examining meanings, associations, and interpretations. This creates a broad thematic palette for scenes.

rant.name: Rant
rant.description: A performer delivers a passionate, opinionated rant inspired by the suggestion. The strong emotion and clear point of view help launch bold, character-driven scenes.

interview.name: Interview
interview.description: One performer interviews another who plays a character, expert, or person connected to the suggestion. The interview reveals details, stakes, and relationships that inspire scenes.

slideshow.name: Slideshow
slideshow.description: The ensemble creates a series of frozen images inspired by the suggestion while a narrator describes each 'slide.' The visuals and narration establish characters, locations, and story ideas.

documentary.name: Documentary
documentary.description: Performed in the style of a documentary, this opening uses talking heads, narration, and reenactments to build a fictional world around the suggestion.

conducted_story.name: Conducted Story
conducted_story.description: A conductor cues multiple performers as they collaboratively tell a story inspired by the suggestion. The focus is on shared narrative, pacing, and group listening.

news_report.name: News Report
news_report.description: Performers present a satirical news broadcast inspired by the suggestion, featuring anchors, reporters, and experts. The format quickly establishes a world ripe with scene potential.
